findings.title: SQL Injection Detection Gap
findings.description: SQL injection attempt not detected by IDS
findings.recommendation: Review and enhance SQL injection detection rules

findings.title: Dashboard API Performance
findings.description: API responds in 0.003s - excellent for SOC operations

findings.title: Timestamp Format Compliance
findings.description: All timestamps use ISO 8601 format - excellent for analysis

findings.title: Limited Threat Intelligence
findings.recommendation: Integrate with threat intelligence feeds (VirusTotal, AbuseIPDB)

findings.title: Limited Geolocation
findings.recommendation: Enhance IP geolocation for better attack attribution

findings.title: CSV Export Capability
findings.description: System supports CSV export for SIEM integration

recommendations.title: Address High Priority Issues
recommendations.description: Resolve 1 high priority findings within 48 hours

recommendations.title: Implement SIEM Integration
recommendations.description: Configure automated log forwarding to enterprise SIEM platform

recommendations.title: Establish Incident Response Procedures
recommendations.description: Create playbooks for common attack scenarios detected by honeypots

recommendations.title: Regular Threat Intelligence Updates
recommendations.description: Schedule automated updates of threat intelligence feeds

recommendations.title: Performance Monitoring
recommendations.description: Implement monitoring for system performance and availability
